footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Shikanoin Heizou | Update Date: 08/05/2022 | Editor: Luno#1337

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers__
Although a strong option to predominantly buff one team member, the overall restrictive nature of the passive for rotations makes flexible rotations much less practical to make full use of the weapon’s passive. 

__Hakushin Ring__ 
A great weapon to buff both electro and hydro party members in electrocharge teams while having relatively flexible rotations. 

__Prototype Amber__ 
A decent option for teams without healers owing to the small yet significant heals. Drops ER requirements by ~80% at R5, enabling Heizou to use 2 Bursts per rotation instead of 1 Burst per rotation for some extra peesonal damage and CC. 

__Favonius Codex__ 
A strong option on Heizou as he can proc the passive once or twice per rotation, dropping team ER requirements significantly when afforded the CRIT Rate substats needed to proc the passive more consistently.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
4 Viridescent is the best set on Heizou by far, both for his personal damage and his buffing capabilities. Only consider the other artifact sets when using a team that does not enable Heizou to consistently swirl, and if the team does not need VV user. ( mono anemo/ geo, secondary VV holder already in team, etc )

for mono anemo/ geo element teams, running a crit build would be much preferred for his personal damage.
